**Zikun Fu**, M.Sc., Computer Science (2024-now) <br>
[Ontario Tech University](https://ontariotechu.ca/)
 
Zikun is pursuing his M.Sc. in Computer Science at Ontario Tech University. His research has been on language model fine-tuning for database entity recognition.  He has worked on data curation, synthetic data generation, model fine-tuning and evaluation of end-to-end ML workflows.

During his M.Sc. studies, Zikun has been published in the following venues two peer-reviewed research paper, on synthetic data augmentation [@fu2024transforming] and DBER pipeline [@fu2025database].
